TopicTitle: "This is Not Nominal": An Adventure in RSS/RO

Articles.Content:
This is a diary of my attempts at a full RSS/RO game. In fact, since it's a sandbox game, it's more of a designer's and pilot's journal than anything else, but it's still bloody difficult because it's RO.

Part the One-th: ALICE 2

Don't ask me what ALICE stands for, or why I chose it. The answer to both is "I don't know."

ALICE 1 and ALICE 1.1 didn't work. We shall say no more of this.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

After at least fifteen tries, I finally orbited something, even though it was a 150 kilogram payload that makes a normal sat look massive. Now excuse me while I go play normal Kerbin-size KSP, because my system can't take RSS, even running forced DirectX11 or OpenGL. At least I feel somewhat validated now. XD

ALICE, Applications of Leaving In Cool-style Earth, maybe...

I especially like that separation shot, the upper stage looks awesome.
